serialized_dashboard: {"datasets":[{"name":"executive_summary","displayName":"Executive Summary Metrics","queryLines":["SELECT","    COUNT(*) AS total_idv_scans,","    COUNT(DISTINCT property_id) AS active_properties,","    COUNT(DISTINCT company_id) AS active_companies,","    SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS passed_scans,","    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) AS pass_rate_percentage","FROM rds.pg_rds_public.id_verifications","WHERE results_provided_at IS NOT NULL","    AND inserted_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 30 DAYS"]},{"name":"daily_trends","displayName":"Daily Volume Trends","queryLines":["SELECT","    DATE(iv.inserted_at) AS scan_date,","    iv.status,","    COUNT(*) AS scan_count","FROM rds.pg_rds_public.id_verifications iv","WHERE iv.results_provided_at IS NOT NULL","    AND iv.inserted_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 30 DAYS","GROUP BY DATE(iv.inserted_at), iv.status","ORDER BY scan_date ASC"]},{"name":"status_distribution","displayName":"Status Distribution","queryLines":["SELECT","    iv.status,","    COUNT(*) AS count","FROM rds.pg_rds_public.id_verifications iv","WHERE iv.results_provided_at IS NOT NULL","    AND iv.inserted_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 30 DAYS","GROUP BY iv.status"]},{"name":"company_overview","displayName":"Company Performance","queryLines":["SELECT","    c.name AS company_name,","    COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) AS num_properties,","    COUNT(DISTINCT iv.id) AS total_scans,","    SUM(CASE WHEN iv.status = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS passed,","    SUM(CASE WHEN iv.status = 'FAIL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS failed,","    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN iv.status = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(iv.id), 1) AS pass_rate","FROM rds.pg_rds_public.companies c","JOIN rds.pg_rds_public.properties p ON c.id = p.company_id","JOIN rds.pg_rds_public.id_verifications iv ON p.id = iv.property_id","WHERE iv.results_provided_at IS NOT NULL","    AND iv.inserted_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 30 DAYS","    AND p.identity_verification_enabled = TRUE","GROUP BY c.name","ORDER BY total_scans DESC"]}],"pages":[{"name":"main_page","displayName":"IDV
